cause.description:
Global Warming is one of the biggest lies of the past years. The fact that CO2 causes warming should be put down as a lie, not as truth. People need to know that the earth goes through various fluctuations in temperature. They also need to know that the Sun is the only thing that controls our climate directly.
Here is a short film from the Heartland Institute debating everything Gore said. It uses clips from Inconvenient Truth and from the Global Warming Swindle and Exposed: Climate of Fear.
http://www.youtube.com/swf/l.swf?video_id=DRaeEIN5Sh8&eurl=http%3A//www.globalwarmingheartland.org/%3Fgclid%3DCNL-ts__h5ACFQ2aOAoddCsctg&iurl=http%3A//img.youtube.com/vi/DRaeEIN5Sh8/default.jpg&t=OEgsToPDskL2a7LzVp0SkuPWRrfQCrfo&rel=1&border=0
Enjoy the truth. And recruit others to spread the truth so the world can stop worrying about the world ending.
1. To stop the spreading of lies of global warming.
2. To show how the Sun is the source of our problems
